mn27:13.8: hoti → imassa anantaraṃ so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato ajjhattaṃ anavajjasukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti vacana d ta idha santosakath ca tattha satisampaja
mn27:17.1: imāya ca ariyāya santuṭṭhiyā samannāgato → etthantare pāṭho idha na dissati, catuk­kaṅ­guttare pana imasmiṃ ṭhāne dissati, aṭṭha­ka­thā­ṭīkāsu ca tadattho pakāsito. tasmā so ettha paṭipūrito. 9M:1388; 10M:1289
